blocks.text: Your psychic senses unfurl like tendrils of light, pushing through the hab-block's ambient interference. You feel the person beyond the door with crystalline clarity — a single soul, female, burning with purpose but without hostility. An aura of authority clings to her like perfume. Inquisitorial authority. She carries something metallic against her chest — a rosette.

You open the door with the calm confidence of someone who already knows the answer. The woman on the other side — auburn hair, grey storm coat — blinks once, surprised by your composure. She expected fear. You gave her certainty.

choices.text: You know exactly who she is before she speaks.
